MAIN_MESSAGE: Today's planned interruption to the electrical supply in the EH27 postcode area of Wilkieston from 8.30am until 4.30pm has been cancelled due to access difficulties on site. If this work is re-arranged, we will contact you to confirm the date and time. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.47am on 25th of January 2021.
